segments.advisor_message: So, um, let's talk about your dependent. I understand, you might have, uh, a name that you want to provide, right?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, their name is, um, Alex, I think, uh, that's it, yeah. Don't really have, um, their full name right now.

segments.advisor_message: I see, uh, and when was Alex born? Right? Just so I can, uh, get the date of birth down, I, uh, need that info.
segments.client_message: Oh, uh, right! Um, I think it was, uh, 15-05-2018 or something like that. Not totally sure, but, you know, that’s what I got, haha.
